outputs.output_descr:
1) The progress towards achieving Millennium Development Goals by 2008 and 2010 analyzed and reported with high quality, in close linkage with the process of review of Socio-Economic Development Programme 2006-2010 and development of Socio-Economic Development Programme 2011-2015, and in a participatory, consultative manner.
2) Millennium Development Goals Report findings and recommendations widely disseminated, advocated and debated to support further Millennium Development Goals awareness raising and localization as well as to feed into national pro-poor policy development process

project_descr: Support to the preparation of MDGR 2008-1010
project_title: Support to the preparation of MDGR 2008-1010
